Service Details: - Works to increase awareness about anxiety disorders, promote education, and increase access to evidence-based resources and treatments - Promotes understanding about anxiety and anxiety disorders through general information sessions, professional seminars and workshops - Offers STRIDES Newsletter which highlights activities, personal stories and features a specific anxiety disorder in each issue - Produces YouTube videos and actively promotes dialogue and exchange information on anxiety and anxiety disorders via our Facebook page - Offers the Mindshift app which helps youth and young adults manage anxiety, using step-by-step strategies
Hours: 24 hours per day, 7 days a week availability
